title: Get Started Page
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user with a fresh install
custom_steps: WHEN the user launches the MLB App for the first time
custom_expected:
THEN they will see the Welcome Screen
AND choose to either log in or get started

title: Welcome Page
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user who Selects Get Started in onboarding
custom_steps:
WHEN the user selects their favorite team
AND clicks next
custom_expected:
THEN they will see the Welcome Screen
AND can choose to either log in, create a free account, Browse subscriptions or Explore Free Content.

title: Onboarding: Favorite Team Picker
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is on an Amazon Fire TV or Android TV device
and has the MLB app installed for the first time
custom_steps: WHEN they land on the favorite teams page
custom_expected: THEN the next button is inaccessible until a team is selected

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN I have just successfully created an account
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN I will be navigated to the account creation successful page
AND the background will contain my favorite team image

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN I am on the account success page
AND I click continue
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN they will be navigated to the home screen as a logged in user

title: Create Account- Automated portion
custom_preconds: GIVEN a logged out user on the create account screen

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN the user unsuccessfully attempts to create an account

WHEN the user is on the create account screen
AND the eye button icon is enabled
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the password field will show as plain text

custom_steps_separated.content: WHEN they are on the create account screen
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN they are presented static messaging
AND the background will contain their favorite team image
AND an empty email and password field
AND an eye button icon that is by default hiding the password
AND an inactive Create Account button
AND an unchecked checkbox to opt-in for marketing

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN they are on the create account screen
AND the email field has been filled in
AND password field has been filled to the minimum character amount
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the Create Account button becomes active

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the logged out user is on the create account screen
AND the user successfully attempts to create an account
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the user will be navigated to the create account confirmation screen

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the logged out user is on the create account screen
AND checks the marketing checkbox 
AND successfully creates an account
custom_steps_separated.expected:
THEN the user will be opted in to marketing emails
(This can be checked by logging into mlb.com as the new user and verifying in the user profile that they are opted in to newsletters)

title: End of Onboarding
custom_preconds: Given a user who is installing the app for the first time (or being forced through onboarding)

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user closes the app before choosing a favorite team
AND the user opens the app again
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will restart or continue the onboarding flow

custom_steps_separated.content:
WHEN the user choose a favorite team 
AND clicks NEXT on the Favorite Team selection page
AND the user closes the app (to truly close the app a force stop in settings will be required)
AND the user opens the app again
custom_steps_separated.expected: THEN the app will open to the Home page
